relatedBlades.title: Secure, accelerate, and transform enterprise networks
relatedBlades.subtitle: Securely connect data centers, branch offices, and cloud services with Cloudflare's connectivity cloud
relatedBlades.copy: Instead of building and operating infrastructure, use the Cloudflare network to expand coverage for your business operations around the world.

columnContent.title: Any-to-any connectivity
columnContent.description: Connect users, offices, and cloud infrastructure, with peerless performance and reliability.

columnContent.title: Comprehensive networking services
columnContent.description: Use Cloudflare to connect and secure inbound traffic, outbound traffic, and east-west traffic across the cloud and your organization.

columnContent.title: Centralized management and visibility
columnContent.description: Manage networking and [security](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-security/) from a single pane of glass. According to a Forrester study, Cloudflare improved security team efficiency by 29% over three years.

relatedBlades.title: What do analysts say about us?

columnContent.title: Cloudflare Named A 'Leader' in The Forrester Waveâ„¢: DDoS Mitigation Solutions, Q1 2021
columnContent.description: According to Forrester, 'Cloudflare protects against DDoS from the edge,and fast,' and that 'customer references view Cloudflare's edge network as a compelling way to protect and deliver applications.'

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named Leader in 2022 GigaOm Radar Report for DDoS Protection
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's DDoS protection solutions help organizations protect their applications,website, and networks - without sacrificing performance.  Our unmetered autonomous DDoS mitigation combined with %{NetworkCapacity} Tbps of network edge capacity can absord and deflect even the largest volumetric attacks.

relatedBlades.heading: How Cloudflare transforms and accelerates networks

content.value: Modernize your network by augmenting or replacing your MPLS circuits or SD-WAN with Cloudflare. Connect using anycast IPsec or GRE tunnels, or use direct physical/virtual connections with
Cloudflare Network Interconnect
Connect users to Internet, cloud, and on-premises resources
Connect offices and data centers over hybrid infrastructure
Use Cloudflare's global network to expand capacity and coverage as your business grows
View all products

With unmatched threat intelligence from the Cloudflare global network, which processes %{HTTPRequests} million HTTP requests per second on average, Cloudflare detects and mitigates threats outside and inside the network.
Cloud-native firewall-as-a-service
DDoS protection with %{NetworkCapacity} of network capacity
Easy-to-implement Zero Trust security
View all products

The Cloudflare global network has a programmable, deeply interconnected network with locations in %{DataCenterCount} cities all over the world. Network requests are processed as close to users as possible.
Simplify site-to-site connectivity
Avoid traffic backhaul to hub sites
Improve performance using dynamic traffic intelligence from the Cloudflare network
View all products

cards.title: WAN transformation
cards.description: Modernize and accelerate your WAN for hybrid work environments and SaaS applications.

cards.title: Layer 3 DDoS protection
cards.description: Mitigate DDoS attacks to ensure uptime and reliability for your network infrastructure.

cards.title: Connect your network to Cloudflare
cards.description: Directly connect your on-premises networks to Cloudflare's network for a more reliable, secure experience.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Consolidating security across employees, applications, and networks to accelerate digital transformation

content.value: Applied has increasingly prioritized digital transformation initiatives to help it serve larger, more demanding enterprise customers. When Chief Information Security Officer Tanner Randolph started in 2021, this meant re-evaluating Applied's technology architecture, seeking opportunities to become more agile, more efficient, and more secure.Â
Starting in 2022, Applied Systems began consolidating large swaths of security and networking functionalities on Cloudflare.
Read case study

"Cloudflare scales with usâ€¦ Cloudflare can handle the increased traffic without us adding network appliances or buying additional bandwidth. Using our previous vendors would have more than doubled our costs."

features.title: Melbourne Airport
features.description: Melbourne Airport streamlined their complex cyber security infrastructure and mitigated DDoS threats from potential hacktivists by using Cloudflare to ensure uptime for all traveler services.

features.title: Wikimedia Foundation
features.description: Cloudflare Magic Transit got Wikimedia's network back online after a massive DDoS attack, and it continues to safeguard the security and reliability of their data centers.

features.title: Nasadiya Technologies
features.description: Using Cloudflare's connectivity cloud, Nasadiya Technologies delivers content to readers across India and around the world while protecting its online publishing platform, against plagiarism.

features.title: Werner Enterprises
features.description: Werner Enterprises moved its legacy applications to the cloud, protected its users from email-borne threats, and consolidated its network security with Cloudflare.

features.title: Applied Systems
features.description: Applied Systems unifies security and networking with Cloudflare, reducing risk, improving productivity for employees, and delivering superior cloud-native experiences for customers.

relatedBlades.title: Protecting hybrid workforces both now and in the future

columnContent.title: Magic WAN
columnContent.description: Connect and secure your branch offices, headquarters, data centers, cloud VPCs and SD-WANs using the Cloudflare network.

columnContent.title: Magic Transit
columnContent.description: Protect your networks, data centers and multi-cloud infrastructure from DDoS attacks.

columnContent.title: Magic Firewall
columnContent.description: Enforce consistent network security policies across your entire WAN, without backhauling traffic or creating choke points.
